text: Babayouré Aboubacar Sawadogo (born 10 August 1989) is a Burkinabé international footballer who plays for AS Douanes, as a goalkeeper. ==Career== Born in Bobo-Dioulasso, Sawadogo has played for RC Kadiogo, Al-Nojoom and AS Douanes. He signed for Al-Nojoom on 9 August 2018.Al-Nojoom is officially signed by Aboubacar Sawadogo He made his international debut for Burkina Faso in 2017. ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Burkinabé footballers Category:Burkina Faso international footballers Category:Rail Club du Kadiogo players Category:Al-Nojoom FC players Category:Prince Mohammad bin Salman League players Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Burkinabé expatriate footballers Category:Burkinabé expatriates in Saudi Arabia Category:Expatriate footballers in Saudi Arabia Category:AS Douanes (Burkina Faso) players
title: Aboubacar Sawadogo
